entry.title: CARTERS/OSHKOSH/G’GOSH STORE COMING TO ROSEBURG
entry.summary: February 4, 2025 3:30 a.m. In the KQEN Business Spotlight: A Carters/Oshkosh B’Gosh store is coming to Roseburg. Featuring kids and baby apparel, accessories and shoes, the outlet will be at the Roseburg Marketplace at the corner of Northwest Garden Valley Boulevard and Northwest Stewart Parkway. The nearly 4,900 square foot store will be located...

entry.title: OVER $4,000 RAISED FOR LOCAL NONPROFIT AT GREATEST OF THE GRAPE
entry.summary: February 4, 2025 3:20 a.m. The Umpqua Valley Winegrowers Association raised $4,000 for the local nonprofit Douglas C.A.R.E.S. at the 53rd annual Greatest of the Grape on Saturday night at Seven Feathers Casino Resort in Canyonville. Known as Oregon’s oldest wine celebration, this year’s event drew over 500 guests, featured tastings of more than 40...

entry.title: FISH FOOD PANTRY EXPANDS HOURS
entry.summary: February 4, 2025 3:05 a.m. In response to the increasing need for accessible food assistance, The FISH of Roseburg is expanding its service to include one Saturday each month. Beginning February 22nd, the pantry will be open on the fourth Saturday of every month from 10:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. FISH Executive Director Jenn Reida...
